co.cask.cdap.api.metrics

Interface MetricsCollector


  • public interface MetricsCollector
    A MetricCollector allows client publish counter metrics.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetricsCollector childCollector(Map<String,String> tags)
      Creates child MetricsCollector that inherits the metrics context from this one and adds extra context information.
      MetricsCollector childCollector(String tagName, String tagValue)
      Convenience method that acts as childCollector(java.util.Map) by supplying single tag.
      void gauge(String metricName, long value)
      Gauge a metric value at the current time.
      void increment(String metricName, long value)
      Log a metric value at the current time.

    • Method Detail

      • increment

        void increment(String metricName,
             long value)
        Log a metric value at the current time.
        Parameters:
        metricName - Name of the metric.
        value - value of the metric.

      • gauge

        void gauge(String metricName,
         long value)
        Gauge a metric value at the current time.
        Parameters:
        metricName - Name of the metric.
        value - value of the metric.

      • childCollector

        MetricsCollector childCollector(Map<String,String> tags)
        Creates child MetricsCollector that inherits the metrics context from this one and adds extra context information.
        Parameters:
        tags - tags to add to the child metrics context
        Returns:
        child MetricsCollector
